pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.1: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.2: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.3: Adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.4: ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.6: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.9: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.11: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.14: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.8:3.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:3.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:3.5: dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.1: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.6: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.11: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti na vācato na cittato,
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti na cittato,
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.13: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato,
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.14: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.17: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
